item.description:
SUNDAY ON STATE STREET

Fall in love with State Street at our Fall Festival

Join us at the State Pulaski Parking
Lot on State Street between
Bradley and Eld. (Its the one accross from the old Castaways & Goodfella's cafe)

12-4PM on SUNDAY the 19th.

*Live Music (Motown, Jazzy, Blues)
*Half price Gift Certificates
*Raffles
*Food Court with comfortable seating for dining
*Historical Walking tours
*Historical Photo Galleries
*Farm Stand featuring produce, cheeses and homemade bread

This festival is being put on by the members
of the Upper State Street Association, Inc.
http://www.upperstate...

I can't make it until 1pm, so that's when I'll be there. Meet in front of Goodfella's at one?
item.name: Upper State Street Festival!!
